title: Define Project Scope and Objectives
description: Outline the specific ethical scenarios to be explored in VirtualEthicsLab, as well as the learning objectives for users.

title: Design VR Environment
description: Create the virtual reality space for users to interact with ethical scenarios.

title: Develop Ethical Scenarios
description: Create a variety of ethical scenarios for users to explore in the VR environment.

title: Develop Interaction Mechanisms
description: Design the methods by which users can interact with and navigate through the ethical scenarios.

title: Implement Ethical Scenarios in VR Environment
description: Code the developed ethical scenarios into the VR environment.

title: Test VR Environment and Scenarios
description: Ensure the VR environment and scenarios function as intended and are user-friendly.
dependencies: Implement Ethical Scenarios in VR Environment

title: Review and Refine VR Environment
description: Revise the VR environment based on test results and user feedback.

title: Document VirtualEthicsLab Features and Usage
description: Write clear instructions and explanations for users on how to use the VirtualEthicsLab.
